## Instructions for Slides

The slides are built using [revealjs](https://revealjs.com). To move around them, the three key things to know are:

1. Left and right arrows move between sections.
2. Up and down arrows move between slides within a section.
3. If you move the cursor to the top left corner a three-bar menu appears. Click on it and you can move between any slides.
4. Or simply use space bar to advance one slide forward at any time.
